DataElement.preferredDefinition: Time of specimen collection represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the (start) time of
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the (start) time of the lab specimen collection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record time of collection (as complete as possible).

ReferenceDocuments.name: LBDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable LBDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: May be required when multiple assessments are done on one day or when the timing in relationship to study treatment is required for analysis or a specimen is collected over an extended time period.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2003580 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
